sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>long</radical> <radical>hair</radical> is your <radical>friend</radical>. It's your <kanji>hair</kanji> and you're so proud of it.
meaningInfo: Just feel your hair, it's such a good friend, and you wish it was longer.
readingMnemonic: Who gave you this hair? Probably the great <ja><reading>神</reading></ja> (<ja>かみ</ja>) of hair. You deserve this great hair.
readingInfo: Pretend to pray to the great hair <ja>神</ja>. What is his reply? Does he give you more hair?
